channel.title: CVE Feed for Mikafon Electronic Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mikafon Electronic Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6699|2024-08-12T20:49:02.080Z -- mikafon%20electronic%20inc. -- mikafon%20ma7
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Mikafon Electronic Inc. Mikafon MA7 allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Mikafon MA7: from v3.0 before v3.1.
